The breakfast really innovative and enjoyable. The rooms were spacious and well appointed. The only flaws were in the design, walking through the bathroom to get to the rest of the suite was a little odd, and the reception can only be accessed by walking up the long driveaway or by a bridge over the pool. Other than that, It is a hotel that I would recommend to any lovers of Bali.

The hotel's GM Mr Dheeraj Bagai personally greeted us and we so frequently saw and spoke to him around the hotel - nothing was impossible for him and his professionalism and kindness amazing! We have recently returned from a wonderful holiday at The Double Six Hotel. From the moment we arrived we were treated like royalty. The staff at this hotel are extremely helpful, friendly and polite, the service is excellent. We would like to thank everyone for a very memorable, relaxing holiday. The hotel is very modern with an international flavour, if you are looking for the typical Balinese hotel you may be disappointed. We can't wait to go back.

We highly recommend Double Six. The hotel is large, luxurious and has absolutely everything you want for a holiday. The suites are huge and absolutely spotless. Nothing is too much trouble and the service is very prompt. The nightly turn down service was a lovely surprise. The room always felt so cosy and welcoming when we returned from dinner each night. We have never experienced this level of service from staff anywhere else we have stayed around the world. Our stay was indeed luxurious and very relaxing and we will never forget the wonderful, friendly staff at Double Six

We holidayed with our family over the New Year period at the Double Six Luxury Hotel for a couple of weeks and our stay was superb. We stayed at Double six hotel for 5 nights to have our wedding there. The moment we booked the events coordinator Fegy emailed to help me plan everything (as I was in Perth, Western Australia) . Fegy went above and beyond to make all our dreams come true. It was the most perfect day. Thankyou to all the staff at Double Six hotel for making our wedding a dream come true. title-text: A great stay at the Double Six

Text: We stayed at Double Six in a beachfront suite and had an absolute fantastic experience. The staff and facilities are exceptional. Ten days of pure pleasure, will definitely be returning. Highly recommend it. One minor issue is that if you want a spot by the pool then best get down there early as the sun beds fill up quickly.
title-text: A nice stay but could be better

Text: We stayed at Double-Six for 8 nights during August. This hotel is amazing and the wonderful reviews that you will read below are correct. Rooms are huge & nicely appointed. Breakfast is the best I've ever had.. Made to order rather than mass produced. Spa treatment is a must to experience. The only negative to report is the music from the restaurant's on the beach. Perhaps they should face their speakers away from the hotel.. Some nights it was like the band was on your balcony!

We stayed at the Double 6 Seminyak for 4 nights from 30 Dec to 4 Jan 2020. Amazing resort with fantastic staff and service, The rooms were amazing and very modern. Would definitely recommend them. The beach across the road was easily accessible as well and the Rooftop bar at the hotel a treat.

We stayed at the double six in Seminyak for 9 nights. The hotel was absolutely amazing, super luxurious, we arrived to amazing welcome drinks plus the service was a 10/10 the whole stay. Room comes with 24hrs free butler service! She was just great, very helpful at all times. Rooms was super big, with an amazing comfy bed! We booked through luxury escapes and had amazing inclusions, such as free cocktails at the amazing rooftop bar!! Great view, awesome sunsets! The hotel is definitely not a party hotel but it was fun to stay at! Not to many kids which was awesome! Veryyy relaxing. The hotel has a spot right in front of the beach which was so handy, They also had awesome cocktails at happy hour by the pool (buy 1 get 1 free) . The only downpoint was the pool menu. It was very; ‚Ä¶

We stayed at the Double Six Resort to turn off from work and de stress and we certainly managed to do that. For the four nights we stayed at the resort we only left the resort for one night as the resort offered everything we needed. From the rooftop bar to the beachside deck chairs the staff constantly looked after us and made our stay so very enjoyable. The Plantation Grill was absolutely top notch and The Sling Bar not only served fabulous cocktails but the staff were great to have a chat with. We also had a wonderful massage in the spa. Would recommend this resort for a complete experience,

date-post: Mary Anne C wrote a review Jan 2015
Text: We stayed at the Double-Six Luxury Hotel in Seminyak from the 29th December, 2014 until January 3rd, 2015. Our stay was excellent! We had an amazing room with a butler and our own private swimming pool. As an interior decorator I found the room to be very trendy with the latest tiles, linens and furniture. The staff were extremely efficient and made our stay very enjoyable. The absolute highlight would have to have been the a la carte breakfasts....they were amazing...the choices were incredible and the food very high class. We also enjoyed the views and the food from the rooftop bar and found the prices very reasonable and the views over the ocean second to none. I would thoroughly recommend a stay at this very high end Hotel and would like to thank the staff for the; ‚Ä¶

We stayed at the new Double-Six from 21-28 October and were given a plunge pool suite when we asked for an upgrade located away from any noisy night club areas. The staff (without exception) were amazingly friendly and incredibly helpful, contributing to the overall enjoyment of our stay. Included breakfasts at the Seminyak Italian Food restaurant were tasty and innovative with outstanding views over the pool and beach areas. The Double Six Rooftop Bar had rooftop prices but was a great place to watch the sunset and it was very easy to achieve the 1,000,000 rupiah minimum spend for the special conversation pits. Our butler booked restaurant reservations for us at Salt Tapas, Bambu & Sarong and also arranged our taxis. Beware the corner crooks offering transport for; ‚Ä¶

We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights `0th-14th August. From the moment we arrived we were treated as very special guests with in-room check in and 24 hour butler service. The suite was pure luxury and impeccable in every way. The individual breakfast menu was the best we have every had in a hotel and individual for all tastes overlooking the beautiful pool and beach. The staff in this hotel are incredible from the head butler Erikson and his wonderful team ready to help make our stay special in every way. The day spa was luxurious and definitely worth a visit! We found the hotel and service faultless and our only regret was for not booking longer! R. & T Morris Perth WA

date-post: Cheryl E wrote a review May 2014
Text: We stayed for 2 nights at this lovely hotel. The check in was a breeze. Hotel Manager( Mr. Bagai) was waiting for us and met at the time of arrival. The room was very spacious and view was amazing( Ocean View) .The bed was very comfortable and the pillows. The bathroom was as big as a bedroom. The swimming pool is huge . The amenities in the room are of high standard. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The selection of minibar is pretty good. We had a surprise the very next day with a birthday cake for my friend. Cant be better than this.

We stayed for 7 nights (from 26th Feb) at the Double Six for third time We visit Bali twice a year & doing so for many years & have stayed in all the usual locations (Sanur, Jimbaran, Ubud, Legian etc) Traveled as a couple this time but often have the kids & partners which can determine where we stay Double Six is perfect for us a couple for the following reasons: It is a suite not a room with a great balcony Huge pool (120m), never feels crowded & great place to watch the action on the beach or sunset Breakfast is "a la carte" which works extremely well & you can order as much as you want Lagoon Bar is brilliant especially at "Happy Hour" with very attentive staff I would just like to address the comments on the noise from the beach bars. Yes, it can be noisy but people, you; ‚Ä¶

We stayed for 7 nights at this new hotel which is in a perfect location opposite Seminyak Beach with lots of restaurants close by. This hotel's greatest asset is the staff with no exceptions. They are all proactive in all areas to ensure excellent service. The suites were spacious and very comfortable and the bathroom was huge with all amenities. As mentioned in previous reviews the room fridge was useless and we ordered ice every day too. Did not quite grasp the butler concept - just seemed a link between us and housekeeping. We went to the reception staff for all our other needs as their service was exceptional and they all spoke very good English so there were no misunderstandings. We did have issues with the pool loungers. There are insufficient for the number of; ‚Ä¶

date-post: Carla B wrote a review Oct 2014
Text: We stayed for 8 nights and overall would say the location is fantastic, across the road from the beach, easy walk to great restaurants. The Double Six Italian restaurant has a great menu but be prepared for small serving sizes. Breakfast has good and varied menu so you won't get bored eating the same old thing. Pool was beautiful with perfect temp and outlook across the ocean. General service around the pool needs some serious looking at as does pool food menu. Pool itself needs much better access to get in and out - no matter your age. OH&S issues (trip/slip/fall) everywhere! Atmosphere average - no Bali inspiration or vibe at all. Fridges in rooms are useless which is a total inconvenience when you want a cold drink and have to wait for room service to deliver ice buckets; ‚Ä¶
title-text: The trendiest and best modern hotel in Bali!

Text: We stayed for a week comprising two days in a garden view room and 5 days in an Ocean View Suite. We found the rooftop bar, the Sling Bar and the various breakfast venues all very good. The a la carte breakfasts comprised a broad range of choices offered by extremely pleasant staff. The staff at the main desks and throughout the complex we all exceptionally professional and the hotel manager Selvarajoo went out of his way to interact with guests and ensure their stay was enjoyable. We stay at many 4.5 to 5 star hotels and I; ‚Ä¶

Text: We stayed for a week recently. The hotel is in an excellent location, with the pool overlooking the beach. The staff are very friendly and attentive. There were plenty of restaurants nearby, though the hotel restaurant was also very good. There was minimal disruption from the construction work, but obviously the top floor of he hotel was not completed, so the rooftop bar was not open.
title-text: Fantastic holiday at Double Six hotel in Seminyak

date-post: T Ben wrote a review Feb 2020
Text: We stayed for the last 2 nights of our holiday.... wish we had stayed here all trip . Perfect staff.... food is amazing lovely room. Thanks double six ... We will be back..... highly recommend this place x

date-post: Danielle A wrote a review Dec 2014
Text: We stayed here for 12 nights and thoroughly enjoyed every minute. Nothing was too hard for any of the staff and any issues were quickly addressed. A group of us travelled (8) here and we paid for an upgraded 2bed master suite - we had an issue with our room on arrival and after speaking with staff (politely) we were moved the following day to what I would say would be one of the best rooms in the hotel, with an uninterrupted view of the spectacular sunsets and beach. If you are considering a 2bed suite then you should clarify with staff or your agent if you are getting a sitting area in the middle of the two rooms, or if the sitting area is in one of the rooms. Overall was a good, comfortable stay. I would say the hotel is a 4* compared to service/amenities we got at our other hotels in Bali. PROS - Service is excellent here. The room was so beautiful and spacious, the staff so wonderful. We were checked-in in the room and shown all the amenities by our wonderful butler. We had definitely arrived in paradise. The pool is a vast infinity pool which runs the entire length of the hotel and is stunning both day and night. Our breakfast each morning was delightful plus we ate dinner several times in the Italian restaurant where the meals were also top notch. The service throughout the resort is amazing as all the staff have been extremely well trained. The spa is beautiful probably the best in Bali. The manager; ‚Ä¶

We stayed in an Ocean View Leisure Suite - the room was luxurious and extremely large. But the thing that set this hotel apart from the others was the staff. In Bali it is common for the staff to be pleasant and accommodating but the staff at Double Six went beyond what was expected of them any time we requested anything and were extremely professional. The breakfast is a-la-carte instead of buffet but you can order anything you wish and as much as you wish from the menu so everything was fresh and straight from the kitchen. The Owners Lounge was a definite plus - here you can camp after checkout; ‚Ä¶

We stayed here for our honeymoon and it was a great choice! The hotel is directly on the beach and so we experienced Bali's famous sunsets at our leisure. The staff are friendly and very helpful! It is very centrally located - you can walk to a lot of great places.

We stayed here from 4-11 November 2014. First trip to Bali, have never wanted to travel there previously. After staying at Double Six we'll definitely be back. From the airport pick up at the start of our holiday we were treated like royalty. The bed was so comfy and the room was serviced twice daily. We were upgraded to an ocean view room which was lovely. There was some noise from the beach, you could hear the band playing, this stopped at around 11pm but as the music was nice we didn't mind. The free standing bath with tv was a real treat. All the staff were so kind and helpful, and we were always greeted with a smile. The Manager kept in touch with me via email and his service and the customer service we received from the rest of the staff was second to none. Cannot; ‚Ä¶

The room was immaculate, beds a little hard but bearable, we had a wonderful corner deck that overlooked the water & it was so well set out & very pretty! The downfall would be that the rooms is right next to Cocoon Bar & across from bars on the beach & I have to say the noise every night was insane! They do give you ear plugs in your room which is an indicator of how noisy it can get. Apart from this the hotel really is fantastic, the food @ the Italian Tratorria was first class, the wait service were on point 24/7 & food absolutely delicious :) WE had room service, pool service, restaurant dining & attended the spa facilities (this in itseld is another; ‚Ä¶

Text: We thoroughly enjoyed a 2 week stay at the fabulous Double Six Resort in Seminyak late Nov to Mid Dec 2014. (which i recommend by the way). we were in the northern side of the resort opposite side to the wonderful roof top bar, where we enjoyed the most beautiful sunset. & Cocoon bar next door. i had no worries with the sultry background music, which we loved actually, sitting on the balcony in the evening before going out to dinner enjoying a couple of duty free drinks...hic! we spent some time by the beautiful massive pool relaxing & reading. all; ‚Ä¶

date-post: David B wrote a review Nov 2014
Text: We took advantage of a special offer which gave us 8 nights in a beautifully presented suite at the brand new Double Six Resort just over the road from Legian Beach. The resort is typical Bali, with a grand open entrance and the best staff we've ever encountered, and this includes 4 & 5 star hotels throughout Europe. When you consider the hotel has around 150 rooms - the personal touch from the management team was nothing short of fantastic. Australian establishments could learn a lot from this hotel!! At the moment there is only one restaurant - which overlooks the entrance on one side, and the pool / ocean on the other, and offers a variety of Italian fare, however there is lots of fine dining close by, and in particular - Seminyak which is a cheap taxi ride away. But overall excellent with professional and friendly staff.
title-text: Loud, late music by night, noisy children by day.

Text: We totally enjoyed our stay once again Not surprised with the attention to detail involving the level of service from all the staff as we have experienced this every time we have stayed at DSLH On arrival we requested an ocean view room away from the restaurant this was accomplished without fuss and in a timely manner Before our departure we had a last day ‚Äúshopping‚Äù and ended up with a large Moose head made of wire, one of the staff porters asked if we needed assistance when we saw that he had totally packaged the item far better than us very impressed The rooms are spacious with fantastic ocean and pool views

We travel to Bali several times a year and have stayed in many luxury hotels and private villas. This time we decided to stay at the new Double Six resort. We are thoroughly enjoying the experience. I would highly recommend to try this place.

date-post: Wendy T wrote a review Sep 2014
Text: We travelled to Bali with another couple. We stumbled on this great looking hotel before we went to Gill T and booked for our final few days before we returned to AU. On arrival we were greeted by the concierge and the General Manager who gave us his business card so if there was anything we needed we should contact him. Well we didn't need to. The staff was fantastic and anything we needed they were there. Room. On arrival, porter took our luggage to the room. When we arrived in our room, our mouths dropped. Room definitely had the WOW factor as soon as you enter. Check in occurred in our room with concierge and butler. We had a very refreshing complimentary cocktail and refresher face towel. We were explained every aspect of the room - with so many features it was amazing.; ‚Ä¶

We usually stay in Nusa Dua however our experience in Seminyak was great. The ocean view suite was very spacious and clean. We loved the butler service and the very friendly and attentive team working at the hotel. Close walking distance to shops and day spas. We have come away feeling relaxed and would most certainly stay at the hotel again next time we visit Bali. Thank you for looking after us.

date-post: Eamonn O wrote a review Oct 2014
Text: We visited this hotel on a package heavily discounted from the rack rate presumably as part of a promotion of it. What a bargain! The hotel is new and part of it is still being constructed but without interfering with the completed section. The staff are helpful with excellent service and the food is excellent. It's heavily air-conditioned. Rooms facing the neighbouring Cocoon Bar would be noisy including into the night so avoiding those would be a good idea. It's hard to think of any criticisms of the hotel. At full tariff it might be competing against the 'name' luxury resorts but at the present prices it's an absolute bargain!
title-text: If you like waiting your in the right place

Text: we were fortunate to secure a 8 night package. Room quality was great. Huge king size bed with a great mattress and quality bedding. The staff were without doubt the best trained and most accommodating we have experienced. The Italian themed restaurant was true to its theme with many genuine dishes superbly presented. Amazing 120 metre pool which wraps around the beach side of the resort. On checking out the resort has a well equipped lounge to provide some snacks and refreshment free of charge pending transfer to the airport. Quality spa and treatment facilities. Staff are well trained and really know what they are doing. Our favourite morning drink was without doubt the Granita Expresso. Crushed ice with a double shot of Expresso and milk and cream to top it off.

date-post: Laura T wrote a review Jan 2015
Text: We were lucky enough to be told about this brand new restaurant whilst on holiday in Bali! It had only been open 9 days when we dined for dinner. An opulent bar to feast your eyes on, so many amazing features to look at. A great Gatsby feel to it with a relaxed and inviting atmosphere. Food was delicious, I had the tiger prawns and they didn't disappoint. Wine list brilliant and excellent value for money. By far the best place I've eaten at for a long time, and not just in Bali. We were lucky enough to be there the night Robert Marchetti was also there (Syd icebergs) and he came over and welcomed us and took the time to chat. Make sure you book ahead as this place will be booked out in no time! It's a winner, can't wait to go back!

We were lucky to stay here for 8 nights in June 2014. The thing we will always remember is the warmth of the amazing staff. Their smiles made every day special. The hotel is right on the beach, so that when you are in the pool, you feel can look over the edge to the beach and sea meters away. You are not cut off from the real Bali, but can wander down a few steps and be among cafes and surf schools in seconds. On a balcony above the pool is the restaurant which serves an amazing breakfast with some of the best coffee we have come across. The rooms are large and well designed, and the day spa a two level extravaganza of pampering. We dined in the restaurant at night and the tuna fillets were extraordinary. To have achieved all this in such a short time since opening is a; ‚Ä¶

We were one of two families staying at Double Six in January. On arrival we were greeted by the manager and warmly welcomed. Service throughout our stay was excellent, with a lot of attention to detail. Rooms were spacious and modern, and the food was superb. The rooftop bar is a must - we spent a great night there enjoying the views and the cocktails. When one daughter got sick, staff went out of their way to help and it was no problem to stay longer in the room on departure because of this, which we really appreciated. We will certainly be back and thanks again!

We were treated so amazingly well from the moment we arrived. Our room wasn't ready (we were a little early) so we were taken to the Owners Lounge and given free drinks and snacks. Our check in was smooth and we were then taken to our lovely room and given a fruit cocktail by our butler and immediately relaxed. This was our honeymoon and they had left a lovely chocolate dessert in the room congratulating us which was a lovely touch. The pool area is great and even though there were some families with small children we never felt like it was too noisy or affected our relaxation in any way. One day when all the sun lounges were taken the pool staff hustled to get us some soft mats to lie on. They were very attentive and always walked up and down the pool area offering service.; ‚Ä¶

date-post: Melbourne Mick wrote a review Jul 2014
Text: We weren't scheduled to stay this hotel, but we decided to take a look whilst having a stroll. So happy we did! As soon as we were shown the Ocean View Leisure Suites we were sold, cancelled our booking at another property and gratefully indulged in the luxury of the new Double-Six Hotel. Absolutely everything is first class, from the staff, to the accommodation, the food in The Italian Restaurant (where we experienced Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner), the Spa and the incredible views. The level of service and attention to detail is second to none. We had a late flight out and we were kindly offered the use of a rear facing room until 8pm, meaning we could have an evening shower and a relaxing meal at the Hotel prior to departing for the Airport - very much appreciated.; ‚Ä¶

Having dealt with the hotel reception staff via email and a few wires getting crossed over availibility, we were unable to complete a booking due in the next few weeks as the hotel was going to be full to the brim with celebrities and the like celebrating the opening of thier new jazzy rooftop bar smack bang in the middle of our suggested booking period. Super friendly staff, we cannot thank you enough. We've booked again for 2020 and are now counting the days.

The food was also very good, though we really only tried the breakfast and poolside menu. The hotel is situated right on the beach with so many dinner options within easy walking distance that we ventured out each night to try something new. I wish we had more time to try out more places, there are so many options! The only downside was the noise when trying to enjoy an evening on our balcony. From around 5:30 to 10:30pm each night there are 2 mildly talented artists battling it out on the beach to see who can sing the loudest. What a fantastic luxury escape.Free Limo pick up at airport on arrival ( and departure). The suite was beyond expectations with our own personal butler. Staff were extremely friendly , efficient and professional. The Italian restaurant is one of the best we have experienced. Such a large menu for breakfast accommodated everyone. The pool was large with ample sunshades and a terrific lunch menu whilst relaxing by the pool. Close to beach, restaurants and shopping. I could even buy Australian newspapers from a hawker outside Double Six. Rooftop bar is great for cocktails, fantastic views,music and watching the sunsets .

What a pleasure it was to spend our Christmas break with our two teenage girls. The staff were very very efficient and could not do enough to help us. We loved sitting at the Italian bar during happy hour and joking around with the bar staff. Thanks so much we loved it

date-post: Michael N wrote a review Jul 2014
Text: What an amazing stay at the double six. The hotel itself is flawless. Has everything you'd would expect from a 5 star hotel. Biggest asset is the people. The staff are so welcoming and friendly. Will do anything to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Rooms are HUGE!! I doubt you'll find a room bigger than this. Close to everything with a short walk (15mins) to the restaurants of Seminyak or taxi drive to Kuta (if that's your thing) Can't wait to return once it's finished!!
title-text: Our best ever holiday in Bali because of Double Six

Text: What an experience, truly beyond our expectations.......... Having been able to experience the Double Six experience, we have now realized just how complacement we'd become at what we were willing to accept at other hotels. Double Six ticked ALL of the boxes and exceeded in so many ways. From check-in everything was seemless. The Lobby staff are extremely professional and courteous. The rooms are well appointed, immaculate, quiet and modern. The space was fantastic as we travelled with two children. The entry doors face the corridor ensuring no distrubance from other guests coming and going. From the quality of the bed, bedding and fittings we felt indulged and comfortable. There was a TV for each of us (if we had needed it) but TV's were only on of an evening for a movie.; ‚Ä¶

What can I say, wonderful hotel, wonderful staff, great food and drink and wonderful location.! Bought a deal from Luxury escapes for 8 nights, wish I had bought two.
